entry.title: Relearn Java Day 1
entry.content:
The foundation is so important for a skyscraper, thus I want to rebuild, or, renovate of my java foundation in the next week (6.26 – 7.3). I will post valuable points here in this relearn java series. Here is Day 1:

  1. Basic Conceptions:
    • Java Virtual Machine(JVM):
      • help Java become cross-platform language(note jvm isn’t cross-platform)
      • between language and operating system
    • Java Runtime Environment(JRE)
      • JVM + 核心类库
    • Java Development Kit(JDK)
      • JRE + javac.exe + jar.exe + …
